title: National Gallery Complete Illustrated Catalogue CDROM
description:
(thanks to Hamgrey who uploaded this to demonoid)

This edition of the National Gallery Complete Illustrated Catalogue on CD-ROM catalogues all the pictures owned by, or on long-term loan to, the Gallery.

Wonderful high-resolution images allow you to view each painting, or any detail of your choice, with exceptional clarity.

The concise text gices the title, date, attribution, inventory number, medium, support and dimensions of every picture, and describes its subject matter, original function and provenance.

An essential tool for art historians, pictures researchers, teachers and anyone with a passion for Western European painting.

- Over 2300 paintings.
- Outstanding visual quality
- 400,000 words of text
- 750 artist biographies
- Over 4000 index terms
- Powerful search, index and cross-reference facilities
